author: bridge-bot
content:
<tbenr> we just pushed a new teku image with the bugfix from yesterday. Things looking good now: https://pithos-explorer.ethdevops.io/block/49682
thanks @parithoshj !

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
I went through our implementation yesterday and started a document of edge cases that we should think/write tests for.
Would be great to extend it with all the pitfalls you thought about during implementing the merge
https://hackmd.io/@76u7HkGHS7-S8srG1WCWjg/B1-hyDaHt

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
Also one thing I noticed during syncing with prysm (I had some weird issue so I needed to resync) 
was that I reexecuted all payloads, even though I already had them in my canonical chain.
This of course takes a long time. So it might be better to check if the payload is already in the chain 
(since we have blockhash and number in the payload) but there might be some security risk attached,
e.g. by providing a payload with correct blockhash and number but invalid other parameters.
Geth will check that the payload produces a correct blockhash before anything else so the improvement
would not be a problem for us, but might be for others. Curious what the other EL's think
